Name: Mirror Party
About the game: A huge crisis broke out in the Mirror-verse. In the name of justice (or probably mischief), the bishojos went to war! Select your heroine and fight! The mini-game collection of Mirror-verse: Mirror Party [GAMPLAY] There are currently 4 minigames, we plan to add as many as we can before the formal release. Tank Battlefield: No one can stop a trumping tank! Except for another tank. Wipe your opponents off of this earth, and earn some points along the way. Leah's Secret Room: Leah has lost many of her stuff and she needs your help to find it. And of course, she's going to reward you... in her own way. Fireball Royale: Launch your mighty fireballs at your rivals and see what happens! Be careful of those poisonous fog, lightning, and more! Frenzy Farm: Who can resist the cute animals? But how about when they have gone frenzy! Contain them with the pumpkins! [GACHA MACHINE] Getting a little tired? I bet our 300+ collectibles can get you back. See those Gacha Tokens you got, put them in the Gacha Machine, and collect as many as you can. 100+ CGs, 100+ Cosplay Albums, Avatars for the Launcher, OST theme songs of Mirror Series. We plan to increase the number of collectibles from 300 to 1000 before the formal release. [FEATURE] 3D-Chibi rendition of characters from the Mirror Series. Covered many genres of games of interesting mechanics. Over 300 (1000 before the formal release) collectibles from the Gacha Machine. On-line component, more people, more fun!
